001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Boundable;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
007
008import java.util.function.Predicate;
009
010public abstract class Projectile<B extends Boundable, M extends Projectile.Medium<B>> {
011    public static final double
012        GRAVITY = 9.81,
013        EPSILON = 0.001;
014
015    public interface Medium<B> {
016        double density();
017        boolean isOf(B hit);
018    }
019
020    protected final Raycast<B> raycast;
021    protected Vector3 position;
022    protected Vector3 velocity;
023    protected double gravity;
024    protected double dragCoeff;
025    protected double dragArea;
026    protected double mass;
027
028    private M medium;
029    private double speed;
030    private double travelled;
031
032    public Projectile(Raycast<B> raycast, Vector3 position, Vector3 velocity, double gravity, double dragCoeff, double dragArea, double mass, M medium) {
033        this.raycast = raycast;
034        this.position = position;
035        this.velocity = velocity;
036        this.gravity = gravity;
037        this.dragCoeff = dragCoeff;
038        this.dragArea = dragArea;
039        this.mass = mass;
040        this.medium = medium;
041    }
042
043    public Raycast<B> raycast() { return raycast; }
044
045    public Vector3 position() { return position; }
046    public void position(Vector3 position) { this.position = position; }
047
048    public Vector3 velocity() { return velocity; }
049    public void velocity(Vector3 velocity) { this.velocity = velocity; }
050
051    public double gravity() { return gravity; }
052    public void gravity(double gravity) { this.gravity = gravity; }
053
054    public double dragCoeff() { return dragCoeff; }
055    public void dragCoeff(double dragCoeff) { this.dragCoeff = dragCoeff; }
056
057    public double dragArea() { return dragArea; }
058    public void dragArea(double dragArea) { this.dragArea = dragArea; }
059
060    public double mass() { return mass; }
061    public void mass(double mass) { this.mass = mass; }
062
063    public M medium() { return medium; }
064    public double speed() { return speed; }
065    public double travelled() { return travelled; }
066
067    protected abstract Predicate<B> castTest();
068    protected abstract M mediumOf(Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit);
069
070    protected double step(TaskContext ctx, double sec) {
071        velocity = velocity.y(velocity.y() - gravity * sec);
072        double sqrSpeed = velocity.sqrLength();
073        if (sqrSpeed <= 0)
074            return 0; // no seconds left to process
075
076        speed = Math.sqrt(sqrSpeed);
077        Vector3 direction = velocity.divide(speed);
078        // drag applies deceleration to the speed
079        // it can, at most, bring the speed to 0, but never invert direction
080        double drag = drag(medium.density(), dragCoeff, dragArea, sqrSpeed, mass);
081        speed = Math.max(0, speed - drag * sec);
082        velocity = direction.multiply(speed);
083        if (speed <= 0)
084            return 0;
085
086        Vector3 epsilon = direction.multiply(EPSILON);
087        double distance = speed * sec;
088        var ray = raycast.cast(position, direction, distance, b ->  !medium.isOf(b) && castTest().test(b));
089
090        var hit = ray.hit();
091        double rayDist = ray.distance();
092        if (hit == null) {
093            position = ray.pos();
094            travelled += rayDist;
095        } else {
096            M newMedium = mediumOf(ray, hit);
097            changeMedium(new StepContext(ctx, direction, speed, epsilon), ray, ray.pos(), medium, newMedium);
098            medium = newMedium;
099
100            if (rayDist > 0) {
101                // ray started outside the bound
102                // move it inwards by the epsilon so, on the next step, it is inside the bound
103                position = ray.pos().add(epsilon);
104                travelled += rayDist + EPSILON;
105            } else {
106                // ray started inside the bound
107                // so we manually move the pos forward
108                distance = -rayDist;
109                position = position.add(direction.multiply(distance));
110                travelled += distance;
111                rayDist = distance;
112            }
113        }
114
115        double remaining = 1 - rayDist / distance;
116        return remaining > EPSILON ? remaining * sec : 0;
117    }
118
119    public void tick(TaskContext ctx) {
120        for (double sec = ctx.delta() / 1000d; sec > 0; sec = step(ctx, sec)) {
121            if (ctx.cancelled()) {
122                removed(ctx);
123                break;
124            }
125        }
126    }
127
128    public record StepContext(
129        TaskContext task, Vector3 direction, double speed, Vector3 epsilon
130    ) {}
131
132    protected void changeMedium(StepContext ctx, Raycast.Result<B> ray, Vector3 position, M oldMedium, M newMedium) {}
133
134    protected void removed(TaskContext ctx) {}
135
136    protected void deflect(Vector3 direction, Vector3 normal, double power) {
137        position = position.subtract(direction.multiply(EPSILON));
138        velocity = Vector3.reflect(velocity, normal).multiply(power);
139    }
140
141    protected void penetrate(Vector3 direction, Vector3 out, double penetration) {
142        position = out.add(direction.multiply(EPSILON));
143        travelled += penetration + EPSILON;
144    }
145
146    /*
147    mediumDensity = kg/m3
148    dragCoeff = (unitless, 0 -> inf)
149    area = m^2
150    sqrSpeed = m/s
151    mass = kg
152     */
153    public static double drag(double mediumDensity, double dragCoeff, double area, double sqrSpeed, double mass) {
154        double force = (mediumDensity * dragCoeff * area * sqrSpeed) / 2;
155        // a = F / m
156        return force / mass;
157    }
158}
